soilHealth.description: Your soil is in excellent health with balanced nutrients and good biological activity.

analysis.soilColor: Dark Brown - Rich in organic matter
analysis.soilType: Loamy - Best soil type for agriculture

fertilizers: Green manure crops like dhaincha or sunhemp
practices: Maintain current moisture levels through mulching
Add organic matter regularly (crop residues, FYM)
Avoid excessive tillage to preserve soil structure
Use drip irrigation for water efficiency
warnings: Monitor pH levels monthly during growing season
Avoid over-watering which can lead to nutrient leaching
Don't apply chemical fertilizers without soil testing
Watch for signs of soil compaction

nextSteps: Apply recommended organic fertilizers before next planting
Test soil again in 3 months to track improvements
Consult local agricultural expert for crop-specific advice
Consider soil testing at certified lab for detailed nutrient analysis
Join farmer groups to learn best practices
